text:
Deal-based extension.

The deals object will also be connected to a custom object schema. When a custom object record is associated to the deal, the CRM Extension will look up the associated record in an external database via API. The  extension will return and display records from the external database that are associated with the referenced object.

Hi folks! We are looking for a full-time HubSpot Technologist, US-based, remote job. I am CRO at Theia Strategies (going through a rebrand). Here's our current website. <https://www.theiamarketing.com/> If you're interested, please send me an email at <mailto:islin@theiamarketing.com|islin@theiamarketing.com>. No agencies please.

Hi Spencer! Feel free to shoot me an email at <mailto:islin@theiamarketing.com|islin@theiamarketing.com>, if you're interested in working with an agency. We've done API integrations and a lot of the more technical HubSpot work.
